gameDetails.name: Legends of Andor: Call of the Skrals
gameDetails.description: Die Legenden von Andor: Der Ruf der Skrale – first released at Spiel 2012 in Essen, Germany – is a single card expansion for Legends of Andor that be used with Legends 2-5 and comes into the game if the first Skral is killed. Once this card is active, all Skrals will move by one field; from then on, each time a Skral is killed, all Skrals immediately move one field.
